name: Mad Box Dead
description:
The much anticipated Mad Rat Dead editor/demake!

To put in your song, replace mysong.ogg with your song. It has to be named mysong, and be .a ogg file.

Currently:

There's only one stage, which loops around on itself and doesn't have an ending. There's no scoring, enemies, death, rewinding,  story, ect...  Mapping the notes has to be done all in one shot; there's no pausing or editing.

To be added, in no particular order:

  • Speed settings
  • Note editing
  • Enemies
  • Saving
  • Rewinding
  • Song Selection
  • Control Remapping/Controller Support

Project files are in Google Docs, idk if that even works. https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1JBxM5Z4qtrLNtiUvHJzObLuIhgaZt2XJ?usp=sha...
